title: Validation report for cdif.bbr.metadata.profiles.adaICPMS - ADA ICP-MS Profile

entries.message: Using example_1_1.json from examples
JSON-LD context is present - uplifting

Output Turtle example_1_1.ttl created

ValidationError: '@id' is a required property

Failed validating 'required' in schema['allOf'][0]['allOf'][0]['allOf'][0]:
    {'required': ['@id',
                  '@type',
                  '@context',

                  'schema:identifier',
                  'schema:dateModified',
                  'schema:subjectOf']}

     'schema:additionalType': ['ada:HRICPMSProcessed',
                               'ada:DataDeliveryPackage'],
     'schema:description': 'High-resolution ICP-MS elemental concentration '
                           'data',
     'schema:name': 'HR-ICP-MS Elemental Analysis'}
